                                                      net.minecraft.util.Formatting messageColor,
                                                      net.minecraft.text.Text taterzenName,
                                                      net.minecraft.util.Formatting taterzenNameColor)
        Inserts colored name of Taterzen in string message.
        Parameters:
        message - message to insert name in.
        messageColor - color format of the message.
        taterzenName - name of the taterzen to insert in message.
        taterzenNameColor - color of the taterzen's name.
        Returns:
        formatted LiteralText
